short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick and easy tab sharing app to watch things with your friends!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WatchPls is an extension that lets you easily share the contents of your tab to a friend. Share anything and everything with a dedicated P2P connection.

Main Features:
- Share anything and everything from your desktop or browser tab.
- Isolated tab audio when sharing a specific tab.
- Randomly generated share URLs to secure a dedicated watch room.
- P2P connection. Note that a good connection is required to use this optimally.



NOTE: this extension is in beta and some features do not work as intended, or at all.
